channel.title: Time Savers on 0x000216

item.title: Put Some Sanity Back In Your Email
item.description: Are you happy with your email? Do you have a good relationship? All the time you spend together, you’d think you’d be perfect for each other. Or maybe not. Email can feel like a burden we can’t escape. At first, it was amazing, maybe even love at first sight. But over time, it became overwhelming. Everything seemed important at the beginning, but now it’s hard to find what matters in the constant flood of messages.
